#summary Overview of installation options

= Introduction =

The !BigBlueButton 0.71a server runs under Ubuntu 10.04 32-bit or 64-bit, as well as distributions listed below.  To setup your own !BigBlueButton server:
    * [BigBlueButtonVM Download the BigBlueButton Virtual Machine (0.71a)] 
    * [InstallationUbuntu Install from packages on Ubuntu 10.04 (0.71a)]
    * Install from source on [InstallingBigBlueButton Ubuntu] (0.71)
    * Install from source on [InstallationBigBlueButtonDebian Debian] (0.70)
    * Install from source on [InstallingBigBlueButtonFreeBSD Install on FreeBSD/PC-BSD] (0.70)

Regardless of the way you choose, the following page shows the configuration files:

   * [ConfigurationFiles Configuration Files]
